channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0830; 12:34PM; 5201 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49YfuMh; #VermontSquare; Firefighters responded to a one-story garage with smoke showing. Firefighters discovered two cars on fire inside the garage. Hose lines were quickly deployed and extinguishment took place. There was one exposure which was extinguished quickly from units in the alley. 26 Firefighters took 10 minutes to put the fire out. No injuries reported and fire is under investigation. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA15 RA33 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Krishan Vadukul

Structure Fire; INC#0830; 12:23PM; 5201 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/49YfuMh; Vermont Square; One story detached garage in the rear of the address with heavy smoke.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E233 E266 E46 RA15 RA33 SQ21 T15 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Krishan Vadukul

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0717; 11:46AM; 10608 N Marklein Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wM71xm; #MissionHills; Firefighters responded to a one story home threatened by an outside fire. Crews quickly deployed hose lines to minimize any involvement inside. Ultimately it took 26 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. ; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC15 E18 E275 E298 E7 E87 RA18 RA87 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Krishan Vadukul

Structure Fire; INC#0717; 11:29AM; 10601 N Marklein Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uKUppW; Mission Hills; Outside fire exposing a one story single family home.; FS 75; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC15 E18 E275 E298 E7 E87 RA18 RA87 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Krishan Vadukul

Traffic Collision with Fire; INC#1579; 10:58PM; EB 134 Fwy x Riverside Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3STHD00; #GriffithPark; PRELIM: One passenger vehicle fell from the Riverside Drive (sometimes referenced as Victory Boulevard) freeway overpass, striking the concrete center divider of the Ventura Freeway (SR134) below, and catching fire. Two patients from that vehicle self-extricated prior to the fire department's arrival: A 65 year-old male and a 60 year-old male (unknown affiliation) with unspecified injuries, who were taken by paramedics to regional trauma centers in serious but stable condition. No other injuries reported. Firefighters remain at scene to control the stubborn flames of the still burning vehicle. No escalating or off-site hazard has been identified. Media Inquiries: CHP Altadena (Log #2867), LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #4856) and Caltrans.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E235 E260 E35 E56 E60 E76 EM5 HR3 RA35 RA56 RA86 SQ21 T35 T60 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0861; 02:36PM; 17606 W Camino De Yatasto; MAP: https://bit.ly/431xdAa; #PacificPalisades; 31 LAFD Firefighters took just 34 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire involving a vehicle and contents within the garage of a 5,288 square foot home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC9 E19 E23 E263 E269 E69 RA23 RA69 T63 T69; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0861; 02:02PM; 17606 W Camino De Yatasto; MAP: https://bit.ly/431xdAa; #PacificPalisades; PRELIM: Fire showing from the front of a two-story home.; FS 23; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC9 E19 E23 E263 E269 E69 RA23 RA69 T63 T69; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0757; 11:54AM; 900 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3T2rA0c; #ExpositionPark; First arriving 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 25 minutes (12:19 PM) to access and confirm full extinguishment of a small fire (with moderate interior smoke) associated with an active roofing operation at the Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County (NHMLA). All occupants of the building were safely evacuated, and no injuries are reported. Media Inquiries: NHMLA.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 BC2 CM22 E13 E15 E210 E226 E26 E266 E34 EM11 RA15 RA815 SQ21 T10 T26 T66; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1343; 05:55PM; 10816 W Blix St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IgAvpF; Toluca Lake; Firefighters responded to the front unit of a one story duplex with smoke reported from an oven fire. 34 firefighters took 10 mins to extinguish flames contained to the oven/stove and immediate area surrounding the appliance. No extension. No reported injuries, Cause under investigation. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 BC5 E102 E260 E289 E76 E86 RA76 RA86 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Jennifer Middleton
